title: Pentakill Poro Game Time!

replies.body: The unseen feeder is the deadliest
I kept running into Veigar's wall.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Nice game man! You guys really turned that around xD!!!
Dam, looks like I missed another one(worth it though since I just saw Avenged Sevenfold and Metallica live).
